p: Production of HCVcc is a robust system to generate infectious HCV in na√Øve cells ( Kato et al., 2006, Zhong et al., 2005). The anti-HCV activity of hundreds of compounds approved for a wide variety of indications was determined immunochemically with anti-HCV E2 antibody in 96-well plate format. Over thirty compounds displayed anti-HCV activities, most of which were directed against HCV entry ( Gastaminza et al., 2010).
